org.dacapo.parser

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dacapo.parser.Config

  • public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class for all options specified in a benchmark's configuration file.

      • getArgs

        public java.lang.String[] getArgs(java.lang.String size)
        Benchmark arguments for a given run size. The return value is a clone so callers are free to modify it.

      • getThreadModel

        public Config.ThreadModel getThreadModel()
        Get the thread model for this benchmark. Apply the default here, because we use 'null' to prevent double-setting in the config file.

      • getThreadCount

        public int getThreadCount(java.lang.String size)
        Determine the multi-threading level of this benchmark size. TODO allow the user to override on the command-line

      • preprocessArgs

        public java.lang.String[] preprocessArgs(java.lang.String size,
                                         java.io.File scratch)
        Retrieve the benchmark arguments for the given size, applying preprocessing as appropriate. The preprocessing that is currently done is:
        • ${SCRATCH} - replaced with the absolute path name of the scratch directory
        • ${THREADS} - replaced with the specified thread count for the benchmark size
